test.title: Your website footprint?
test.firstP: The internet consumes a lot of electricity. 416.2TWh per year to be precise, that's more than the entire United Kingdom.
test.secondP: Do a quick scan of your website to understand its courrent impact.

aboutPage.title: Limit team
aboutPage.firstP: We are dedicated to make a difference.
aboutPage.secondP: You can see in an instant which pages uses the most energy and how much CO2 you've emitted and compensated this month. Recive tips on hou to reduce the carbon fottprint of the pages on your websites.

footer.firstP: We are trying to raise awarness on the impact website have on our planet. Limit your website emission by following few recommendations.
footer.secondP: Be the first one to know about news and our next features to keep our planet saver.
